thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Employers Holdings Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.94

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Employers Holdings Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.94
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Employers Holdings Inc:
* EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.06 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.94 * ‍BOARD DECLARED AN INCREASED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.20 PER SHARE AND AUTHORIZED A NEW $50.0 MILLION SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM​
* QTRLY ‍NET EARNED PREMIUMS OF $181.6 MILLION INCREASED $9.6 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
